skill_e.tooltip: Miss Fortune reveals an area, raining down bullets that deal 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.8) magic damage over 2 seconds and slow enemies hit by 40/45/50/55/60%.

skill_i.tooltip: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she basic attacks a new target.

skill_q.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing 20/40/60/80/100 (+1) (+0.35) physical damage to each target hit. Both apply on-hit effects.

The second shot can critically strike for ?% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

skill_r.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for ? seconds, dealing ? physical damage per wave (? waves total).

Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike for ? damage.

Total Damage: ?

skill_w.tooltip:
Passive: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains 25 Movement Speed. After another 5 seconds, this bonus increases to 50/60/70/80/90.

Active: Fully activates Strut's Movement Speed and grants 40/55/70/85/100% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

Love Taps reduce the cooldown of Strut by ? seconds.
